text: Usool al-Thalatha الأصول الثلاثة About the book Author Muhammad ibn abd al-Wahab Country Saudi Arabia Language Arabic Publication 18th century AD Genre Islamic book Usool al-Thalatha is a concise summary of the Three Principles of Islam according to the Qur'an and Sunnah. The book is authored by Muhammad ibn Abd al-Wahhab. These summaries were used by scholars to spread to their students as fundamental principles. Some have suggested that the book has been written at a earlier time. == References == Category:Islam Category:Books Category:Religion
title: Usool al-Thalatha
